name: GetFinancial.co.uk
overview:
Our aim is to help you find the best advisor for your needs.

GetFinancial.co.uk is a quick and easy way to find a financial advisor who can help you deal with a specific financial matter like getting a mortgage or help you to achieve your personal financial goals in the long term.

We help consumers find 3 kinds of financial adviser: Mortgage advisors

A mortgage is the biggest financial commitment most of us will make in our lives, so it makes sense to get advice from an expert. The advisers that we recommend are fully qualified to help you make the right decision. Life insurance advisors

Life insurance is a wise decision for anyone who is relied upon for financial support. Get the facts by speaking to a qualified professional who will assist you in making the right decision and getting the right policy. Debt advisors

If your debt has sprialled out of control, as it has for many in recent years, then it can also help to speak to a qualified professional to develop a plan to get out of it. By seeking professional advice, you may be able to find a way out.

We do not steer you towards a ‘favoured’ advisor, and we don’ offer any financial advice so we don’t have any affiliation with any particular financial product provider. What we do is take some basic information so that we can understand your needs and requirements and then find the right, professionally qualified financial adviser to help you.
